page.title: 06LARKHALL_MODERN DECORATION
page.content: LARKHALL_MODERN DECORATION FROM A SURVEY IT WAS FOUND THAT MOST PEOPLE HAVE A FITTED KITCHEN MADE OF FORMICA AND WOOD.MOST PEOPLE HAVE A FITTED BATHROOM SUITE AND THE MOST POPULAR COLOUR IS GREEN.IF LINEOLEUM IS USED IT IS USUALLY IN THE KITCHEN HOWEVER IN GENERAL CARPET TILES SEEM TO BE MORE POPULAR IN THE KITCHEN THAN IN THE BATHROOM.MOST PEOPLE HAVE CARPETING THROUGHOUT THEIR HOME. TRADITIONAL WOODEN DOORS ARE VERY COMMON.IN WINDOWS A LOT OF PEOPLE STILL HAVE SINGLE GLAZING BUT DOUBLE GLAZING IS BECOMING MORE POPULAR.MOST PEOPLE PREFER SELF_COLOURED WALL PAPER TO BRIGHT PATTERNED PAPER AND PEOPLE PREFER PASTEL SHADES TO DRIGHT ONES.MOST PEOPLE LIKE PICTURES ON THEIR WALLS.AND MOST PEOPLE GET THEIR HOUSES REDECORATED EVERY YEAR.
